mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.mainid AS "mainid", a.projectid AS "projectid", a.remark AS "remark", a.amount AS "amount", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.updatedate AS "updatedate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fa_reimburse_longdistance( id, mainid, projectid, remark, amount, createdate, updatedate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mainid}, #{projectid}, #{remark}, #{amount}, #{createdate}, #{updatedate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fa_reimburse_longdistance SET mainid = #{mainid}, projectid = #{projectid}, remark = #{remark}, amount = #{amount}, createdate = #{createdate}, updatedate = #{updatedate} WHERE id = #{id}
